BR_text.BRdescription:
Hello,
 I am going through some of the source code as a learning exercise, and I noticed that in
 <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Itseez/opencv/blob/master/modules/imgproc/src/contours.cpp>https://github.com/Itseez/opencv/blob/master/modules/imgproc/src/contours.cpp</denchmark-link>
 
 in the method
 cvStartFindContours
 scanner-> is assigned twice:
 line 219: scanner->mode = mode;
 line 225: scanner->mode = (int) mode;

comments_0.comment_text: You can submit a pull request fixing this. Looks like a copy-paste bug to me

comments_1.comment_text: I am putting together a list of all similar things in the parts of the library I am looking at. THen I will do the pull request.

comments_2.comment_text: 👍 great! Thank you for fixing stuff :)

comments_3.comment_text: Also in this case, the one on line 225 can go, because mode is already defined as an integer so we do not need explicit conversion...

comments_4.comment_text: Don't you think we can mark it as closed as PR is merged?
